{{Infobox figure skater |name= Ashley Cain |image=2011 CofR 1d 358 Ashley Cain Joshua Reagan.JPG |caption= |fullname= |altname= |country= [[United States]] |formercountry= |birth_date= {{birth date and age|1995|7|22}} |birth_place= [[Carrollton, Texas]] |hometown= [[Coppell, Texas]] |residence= |death_date= |death_place= |height= {{height|m=1.67}} |partner= '''[[Joshua Reagan]]''' |formerpartner= Sergei Sidorov |coach= David Kirby, Peter Cain |formercoach= |choreographer= David Kirby, Evgeni Nemirovski |formerchoreographer= |skating club= Stars FSC of Texas |former skating club = |currenttraininglocations = [[Euless, Texas]] |formertraininglocations = |beganskating = 1999 |retired= |worldranking= '''24''' (''{{As of|2011|9|16}}'') |pbrankings = '''29''' (''[[2010â2011 figure skating season|2010â2011]]'') |combined total= |combined date= |SP score= |SP date= |FS score= |FS date= }} '''Ashley Cain''' (born July 22, 1995 in [[Carrollton, Texas]]) is an [[United States of America|American]] [[Figure skating|figure skater]] who competes in [[single skating]] and [[pair skating]]. With partner [[Joshua Reagan]], she is the [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|2011 U.S. Junior champion]]. Her father, [[Peter Cain]], is a former Australian pair skater. == Programs == === Singles career === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Season ! Short program !
